message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500. I believe this product will be highly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your offer, I'm looking for a price closer to $9,000. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident you'll see a great return on your investment.
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $9,000. Can you meet me at $8,800?
